name: Spooky Ghost Pepper Jack-o'-Lantern Pasta
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried chili flakes (adjust spice level to taste)
Optional: sliced black olives for garnish
instructions: 1. Cook Ghost Pepper Jack-o'-Lantern Pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and diced onion, sauté until fragrant and onion is translucent.
3. Add diced tomatoes to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, until slightly softened.
4. Pour in vegetable broth and dried chili flakes. Stir well and bring to a simmer.
5. Season with salt and pepper according to taste. Adjust spice level by adding more chili flakes if desired.
6. Add the cooked Ghost Pepper Jack-o'-Lantern Pasta to the skillet and toss gently to coat it with the sauce. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, allowing the pasta to absorb some of the flavors.
7. Remove from heat and transfer to serving plates. Garnish with sliced black olives if desired.
description: Spooky Ghost Pepper Jack-o'-Lantern Pasta is a fiery and flavorful dish that incorporates spicy Ghost Pepper pasta with a zesty tomato sauce. The chili flakes add an extra kick of heat, making it perfect for those who enjoy a spicy dinner. The dish is visually appealing thanks to the Halloween-themed pasta, making it a fun option for parties or themed meals.
